ResearchProjectDef.label: communications I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "These guys that keep coming by." \n"Yes, I saw them. They have stuff in their tents we could buy. But they won't sell us anything because we don't have this thing they call 'Trade Beacon'." \n"Maybe build one then. Make sure it's outside though."

ResearchProjectDef.label: communications II
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"I was stargazing last night, it was wonderful! I saw one star was moving faster than all the others. So cool!" 
"Wait, maybe that wasn't a star. Maybe it was a space ship passing by. We need to build a Communications Console so we can contact them when they fly by next time!" 
"A telephone you mean?" 
"Uhm, yes, basically ... Only bigger."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "What do you mean? These potato salads are hard work!" \n"No, no I know. I'm just saying we could plant something different for a change. Maybe we could even build a ChemLab, plant some Xerigium and make herbal medicine." \n"And what about fences? Fences are pretty!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine I
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Outch!" 
... 
"I'm afraid that doesn't look too good. I think we need to amputate. There is nothing else we can do." 
"Oh my. We should have made some real medicine much earlier I guess."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This Vitals Monitor will help us to take care of our sick friends. I also think we can make much better prostetics by using steel and aluminum."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine III
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"It might be possible to grow replacement organs. But we need Biomatter for that." 
"Biomatter?" 
"Yes, we just extract it from human corpses. Let's build an Organ Vat." 
"Eww, you sure about that?"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Bionics! I already feel like a robot! That is, if robots could feel anything. Oh well, forget about it and give me a bionic leg already!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine V
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Nice bionic arm you got there. You like that retro look, don't you?" 
"What?! It's so futuristic and cool." 
"Well, if we had upgraded it before we installed it, you could have a much better arm now, you know." 
"And you are telling me this now? Great..."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "These new plants grow faster and yield more than the ones we have been growing so far. But we need to fertilize the soil for them to grow. I'll set up a composter so we can get that going." \n"Well, you do that. I'm off catching some fish!" \nUnlocks: Fertilized Soil, Fishing Rod, Harpoon (made at the Basic Weapon Crafting Workbench)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Yummy!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "I'm so tired. I'm hauling food all day. And for what? It just ends up rotting and we need to throw it away!" \n"Oh, stop complaining. Have a coffee and start canning the food then!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture III
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Ok, so these Muffalo ate all the crops and there are no more fish left in the pond. We should think about doing some indoor gardening. Or even start an aquaculture." 
"Good idea, maybe we should also plant some beans and make tofu." 
"But beans won't grow on that dry soil. We have to add some water to it. I might start digging a hole to build a well." 
Unlocks: Watered Soil

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture IV
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"We should seriously think about planting some of these new plants. They not only grow faster and yield more, they even taste good when eaten raw!" 
"That all sounds great, but we have no more place to grow them." 
"Hm, time to build a couple terraforming pumps then. Oh, and these plants won't grow on the fields we have, it seems." 
"I'll just throw some more water and fertilizer on them. I'm sure that will work." 
Unlocks: Enriched Soil

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruit Trees
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Even more plants you say?" \n"These fruit trees are the best! And we can harvest them without the need to replant them every time."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Look at our food! It's rotting before we can eat it. And my bedroom is too cold!" \n"Ok, then. We should build some heaters and coolers. Some nicer tables and chairs also wouldn't hurt."

ResearchProjectDef.label: glassworks research
ResearchProjectDef.description: "By smelting sand we can produce glass." \n"Finally I get a light and a window in my room! Maybe even a glass autodoor!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Phew! Mining all this rock sure is a lot of work." \n"Why don't you use this pickaxe we have lying around? You would be 20% faster." \nUnlocks: Mining Speed +20%

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mobile Mining Sonar
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Go mine some steel ore, we need it!" \n"Well, I don't see any steel ore. Where should I mine?" \n"Hm, maybe we need to scan the mountains for ore before we start digging."

ResearchProjectDef.label: furniture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Argh, my back hurts! We really need some comfy furniture. And always playing horseshoes gets boring! What about a chess table?"

ResearchProjectDef.label: furniture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This room looks pretty comfy with the couch and stuff. But the walls are empty. Is somebody good at painting?"

"These small coolers and heaters are not enough. We need to think bigger." \n"Or we could build a duct network, that would be more efficient." \n"Efficient you say? We don't even have real automatic doors yet..."
ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction II
cremation
ResearchProjectDef.description: "All this stuff! And all the corpses! I am not digging graves for all the tribals!" \n"Ok fine, let's build a crematorium."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "So where did I put this pistol? What a mess!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Storage II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Beam me up... Um, no seriously, how does this work?" \n"This is an advanced storage solution. When placed under a stockpile zone it will attempt to pile up adjacent items on top of itself, well over normal storage limits. Also does some teleporting."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction III
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Oh my?" 
"I said M - A - I. That's a Mobile Artificial Intelligence. These robots can support the colony." 
"Can they help me build some of the Lighted Walls you wanted so much?" 
"Sure, but we need to program them first so they know how to build stuff."

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Construction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can construct buildings. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where construction is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Mining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can mine. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where mining is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Combat Tactics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can use combat tactics. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you in combat situations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can cook. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where cooking is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Caring
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can care for colonists. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where caring is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can craft. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where crafting is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AI: Intellectual
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches how an artificial intelligence can research. \nThe next mobile AIs you build have the ability to support you where research is needed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Construction IV
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Ok I'm done. Let's get outta here!" 
"Not so fast. We need to build the whole ship first." 
*grumble* 
*grumble*

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ore Extractor
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This machine digs deep into the ground and extracts metals from the earth. But we need to create a deep fissure first, which can be used to access the lower layers of the planet's crust." \n"So no more mining? Yay!" \n"Not only that. We can also create a steam geyser where ever we want!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Building this wall out of round stone chunks didn't work. We have to cut them into some kind of block shape." \n"We also need to find a way to get the metal out of these rocks. Maybe if we smelt the ore in some kind of furnace?" \n"A wall? Who needs a wall when I could make a beautiful sculpture with these blocks!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: textile I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Our clothes won't last forever. It's time to think about growing some cotton so we can weave cloth and start tailoring." \n"We have all these clothes the tribals came in that nobody wants to wear. We could use the materials from them to make some neat clothing for us!" \n"I just want a Baseball Cap!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: textile II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Hyperweave: High-tech nano-fibers woven into sheets. It is somewhat heavy, but is incredibly difficult to break. Devilstrand: Fabric spun from microfibers extracted from silk-producing Devilstrand mushrooms. Very tough, but insulates no better than cloth." \n"Ok Sherlock, everybody knows that... \nWhy Don't we just make some nice carpets first? My feet are getting cold."

ResearchProjectDef.label: textile III
ResearchProjectDef.description: "" \nUnlocks: Recycle Apparel, advanced Armor (made at the Smithing Table)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "It's taking forever to cut all the chunks by hand! We need better equipment!" \n"Powered crafting tables would be a good idea. The better tools would even allow us to make armor vests to protect ourselves." \nAlso Unlocks: Tool Cabinet, Multi Analyser

ResearchProjectDef.label: food synthesizer
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This machine can make food for all of us. And we don't have to cook anymore." \n"But it tastes horrible!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: nutrient resynthesis
ResearchProjectDef.description: "I found a way to improve the Nutrient Paste Dispenser! It now needs 10% less food per meal produced." \n"Great, even more of this stuff... Don't you get it? It tastes h-o-r-r-i-b-l-e..."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting III
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Electronic Chips, Integrated Circuitboards. It's gonna be great!" \n"That is pretty advanced. Are you sure this will work?" \n*bzzzt*

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crafting IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This plant is magical! With the right tools, we can replicate any stone chunks we want from it." \n"Better plant some of them fast. The mountain I was digging in is about to collapse I think..."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "It's pretty unsafe having a campfire inside your room, you know?" \n"But it was so cold and dark inside." \n"We really need to start generating power so we can have some lights."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Outdoor Lighting
ResearchProjectDef.description: "I can't work outside when it's so dark everywhere. We need some lamps outside, too."

ResearchProjectDef.label: colored lights
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Look! Look! Isn't this green light beautiful?" \n"Stop wasting all of our glass! You think this is a disco or what?" \n"Aww, common..."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power II
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Solar Power allows us to harness the power of the sun!" 
"We could also use some fuses. Last time the power went out for the whole night. Remember? It was during that solar flare." 
"If we could only shield the colony from these solar flares, all would be good." 
Unlocks: Battery efficiency +15%

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automatic Power Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research a motion detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch on when someone is in the room. Additionally further enhancement is now possible.\nNOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Timer Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research an timer for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching at specific times.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch at specified times. \nNOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Automatic Enemy Switch
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research an enemy detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching when an enemy is found.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch when an enemy is detected.\nNOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power III
ResearchProjectDef.description:
"Did you see this hole in the ground over there?" 
"It looks like there is steam coming out of it." 
"I wonder if we could make use of that somehow..." 
Unlocks: Battery efficiency +15%

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasma Power
ResearchProjectDef.description: "It's plasma, who doesn't like plasma?" \n"This thing gets pretty hot and it needs to be charged before it produces power. I don't know about that."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nuclear Power
ResearchProjectDef.description: "I saw you brought back some kind of green stone last time you went out for mining steel ore." \n"Ah, yes it's Uranium. I'll build a nuclear reactor with it. It's totally save." \n"Ok sure, why not. I'm sure nothing terrible happens."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Natural Power
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Now that we got the basics down with wind and solar energy, why not upgrade the turbines and panels we have?" \n"Nah, I'm not in the mood for working today - I'll just play some horseshoes."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Power IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: "We still don't have enough power." \n"What about building a really big generator? It's gonna be a lot of work though." \nUnlocks: Battery efficiency +15%

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "I would give you this bow so you can help defending the colony. But not before you get some practice at the shooting range first." \n"Really? Just because I shot myself in the foot last time the tribals came?"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Turrets I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "This turret we can build right now is rather improvised. Let's make some better ones."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Turrets II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Where do they come from? From the east you say? Ok I carry the turrets over there." \n"Wait! I can make a Cannon Turret. It has a much better range, but I need you to make me some cannon shells for it."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon Crafting I
ResearchProjectDef.description: "These Pilas are pretty good but I feel we need some real weapons rather sooner than later." \n"Ok, I make the weapon parts, you assemble them. Quick! Before the tribals come!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon Crafting II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "After making all these basic pistols, I came up with some better gun designs." \n"Great! We need to defend the colony!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Weapon Crafting III
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Have you made the electronic chips yet? I bet I could make some really nice guns with these."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security II
ResearchProjectDef.description: "What are these raiders doing? They just stay over there and don't attack the colony." \n"Oh no, looks like they are building a mortar to attack us from far away!" \n"Quick! Build one for ourselves so we can fire back!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Explosive IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Hehe - They will never see this artillery shell I burried over there. Once they get close and step on it - boom!" \n"That's so unfair! I like it!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Incendiary IEDs
ResearchProjectDef.description: "The improved version of my trap. It's even more boom per shell!"

ResearchProjectDef.label: Security III
ResearchProjectDef.description: "We already have fence over there, don't we?" \n"But it's not made out of laser. So it doesn't count." \n"Have you been drinking too much Spectago Tea again? We need Embrasures, not fences made out of laser!"
